body_content.explanation: to suddenly turn and go in the opposite direction than the one you were travelling in:
examples: We had to make a 180 because we missed the turn.
"Can you tell me where the hotel is?" "Sure - make a 180 and walk back to High Street, then take a left."

body_content.explanation: to suddenly change from a particular opinion, decision, or plan to an opposite one:
examples: We made a 180 and decided to go after all.
It made me do a 180 in terms of how I think about my life - I realized that I needed to take responsibility for creating the life I want.
